tagline: Quality Roofing & Construction You Can Trust
description: Bennett Construction & Roofing provides expert roofing, siding, gutters, and general construction services. Licensed, insured, and trusted for over 25 years.

trustBadges.title: Licensed & Insured
trustBadges.description: Fully licensed, bonded, and insured for your complete peace of mind.

trustBadges.title: 25+ Years Experience
trustBadges.description: Trusted by thousands of homeowners since 2000.

trustBadges.title: Free Estimates
trustBadges.description: No-obligation quotes with transparent, upfront pricing.

trustBadges.title: Satisfaction Guaranteed
trustBadges.description: We stand behind every project with our workmanship warranty.

process.title: Free Inspection
process.description: We thoroughly inspect your property and assess your needs.

process.title: Detailed Quote
process.description: Receive a transparent, no-surprise estimate for your project.

process.title: Schedule Work
process.description: Pick a time that works for you. We show up on time, every time.

process.title: Quality Build

process.title: Final Walkthrough
process.description: We review the work together to ensure your complete satisfaction.
